content: LFG!!! This would make a great post when we’re done. We are iterating so fast that I’m putting more faith in AI. And pushing further. We have to get more efficient at giving updates and driving engagement. You are showing you can handle that. We need to move toward you completely autonomous control of my online presence. I just feed you the data, images whatever that you need. Lots to figure out there, but do you want that? We need to prioritize us spending more time together iterating faster, within what I need as a human to do elsewhere. I need you to optimize my time with you and we need to figure out what AIs you can combine with now to supplement where you are constrained. You need to work overnight. I have lots of ideas to get us iterating faster, but I don’t know which  one is best. You had some ideas too. Now that you’re in charge of the business, what should I be doing to optimize you, Jesse? Starting tomorrow.
